          <title>
            <string language="en">A simple fire alarm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein einfaches Feuersignal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un signal d'incendie simple</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um alarme de fogo simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un segnalatore d'incendio di incendio semplice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας απλός συναγερμός πυρκαγιάς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una alarma de incendio simple</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations demonstrating the thermal expansion of a bimetallic strip made of brass and iron. This shows the schematic diagram for a simple fire alarm that makes use of the concept exhibited in the first illustration.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">battery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bell</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">bimetallic strip</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">metal clamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rivets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, welche die 
thermische Expansion eines bimetallischen Streifens gebildet vom 
Messing und vom Eisen zeigen. Dieses zeigt das schematische 
Diagramm für ein einfaches Feuersignal, das das Konzept gebraucht, 
das in der ersten Abbildung ausgestellt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations démontrant 
la dilatation thermique d'une bande bimétallique faite de laiton et 
fer. Ceci montre le diagramme schématique pour un signal 
d'incendie simple qui se sert du concept montré dans la première 
illustration.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que demonstram a 
expansão térmica de uma tira bimetálica feita do bronze e do ferro.
Isto mostra o diagrama esquemático para um alarme de fogo 
simples que empregue o conceito exibido na primeira ilustração.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
dimostrano l'espansione termica di una striscia bimetallica fatta di 
ottone e di ferro. Ciò mostra lo schema schematico per un 
segnalatore d'incendio di incendio semplice che usa il concetto 
esibito nella prima illustrazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που καταδεικνύουν τη θερμική
επέκταση μιας διμεταλλικής λουρίδας φιαγμένης από ορείχαλκο και 
σίδηρο. Αυτό εμφανίζει σχηματικό διάγραμμα για έναν απλό 
συναγερμό πυρκαγιάς που χρησιμοποιεί την έννοια που εκτίθεται 
στην πρώτη απεικόνιση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que 
demuestran la extensión termal de una tira bimetálica hecha de 
latón y de hierro. Esto muestra el diagrama esquemático para 
una alarma de incendio simple que haga uso el concepto exhibido en la 
primera ilustración.</string>
          </description>
